programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for his son's deaths.

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A werewolf horror with a military twist.

programme.title: Legionnaire
programme.desc: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split.

programme.title: Cockneys vs. Zombies
programme.desc: A heist goes wrong during a zombie outbreak.

programme.title: Freejack
programme.desc: A man is hunted for his body in the future.

programme.title: A Midnight Clear
programme.desc: The Ardennes Forest, December 1944. A squad of six US infantrymen is sent to occupy a house to use as an observation post as the German Army is expected to advance through that area. However, the Germans seem oddly friendly.

programme.title: Undead
programme.desc: A quaint Australian fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the ravenous undead, leaving a small group of those unharmed to find a way out

programme.title: Halo 4: Forward Unto Dawn
programme.desc: UNSC Cadet Thomas Lasky must conquer his inner fears and join forces with super-soldier.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a homesteading family's life when they are attacked by a ruthless gang.
